scenario_name: Gradual Intelligence Reveal Over Many Turns
description: Long conversation where scammer very slowly reveals different pieces of intelligence across many turns. Tests agent's patience and engagement stamina.

turns.scammer_message: Instant Personal Loan approved! Rs.5 Lakh @ 0% interest for first 6 months. Limited time offer. Reply YES to proceed.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 1 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: yes... but i did not apply for loan. is this sbi? i am retired school teacher... i need money for house repairs but i dont know process. pls guide me

turns.scammer_message: Congratulations! Your loan application is pre-approved. No documents needed, no CIBIL check. Just pay processing fee and money will be in your account same day.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: oh thank you beta... this is blessing. my roof is leaking and i need repair money. how much is fee? and how do i send it to you? i only have gpay on my phone which my son installed... pls tell step by step

turns.scammer_message: Processing fee is only Rs.2,999. Very small amount for Rs.5 lakh loan right? This is standard procedure in all banks. Are you ready to proceed?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: yes beta i am ready... 2999 rs is ok. i have some savings in bank. pls tell me waht is your gpay number or upi id? i want to send now so i can get loan money fast... roof is leaking bad

turns.scammer_message: Great decision! I will send you payment details. First let me verify - what is your monthly income? And which bank account you want loan credited to?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: oh ok beta... my monthly income is just my pension from teaching... it is around 15000 rs. and my bank account number is 901594497956513. now pls send me your upi id... i need to send the fee fast before more water comes in

turns.scammer_message: Perfect! Your profile is excellent. Now for payment, you can use multiple methods. Which is convenient for you - UPI, bank transfer, or debit card?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: beta i only have gpay on phone... i dont know how to do other things. pls tell me your upi id or number. i will type it and send 2999 rs immediately. i am very worried about roof... rain is coming again pls help me fast

turns.scammer_message: Good choice! I will give you UPI ID shortly. But first, have you taken loan before? Any existing loans? This info needed for approval.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 6 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: no beta i have never taken a loan... always scared of them. i just have my small pension. pls give me the upi id now... i have my phone open. the sky is getting dark again i am very worried

turns.scammer_message: Okay understood. Now pay Rs.2999 to our company UPI: quickloan.processing@okicici and your loan will be approved in 30 minutes!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 7 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i typed quickloan.processing@okicici in my gpay... but i am scared to click pay button without checking. waht name should come up on screen? i dont want to send money to wrong person by mistake... pls tell me exact name so i can confirm and send fast... rain started again

turns.scammer_message: Yes mam/sir, UPI is quickloan.processing@okicici. After payment, call our loan officer at 9876543210 with payment reference number.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 8 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i noted down the phone number... but pls listen... on my gpay screen when i put that upi id it is showing a name... i want to be 100% sure it is you before i press pay. what name is it? is it a company name or a person name? pls tell me the exact name beta i am very nervous to send wrong... my hands are shaking

turns.scammer_message: If UPI shows error, you can pay by NEFT. I will give account details after you try UPI first. Try now and let me know if successful.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 9 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: beta i tried the upi but it is saying transaction failed... i am so worried. pls give me the neft details you said? i need the account number and the exact beneficiary name to add in my bank app. pls tell me fast... i want to send the money before rain gets worse

turns.scammer_message: No problem. Bank details: Account 12345678909876, IFSC HDFC0002468, Name: QuickLoan Processing Pvt Ltd. Transfer Rs.2999 and WhatsApp screenshot to 8899776655.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 10 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i am writing it down... quickloan processing pvt ltd... and account 12345678909876... oh wait beta my son just came home! he is early today from work. let me ask him to help me send the money he knows how to use this app better than me. one minute i will show him your message...

turns.scammer_message: After payment, you also need to complete loan agreement form on our portal. Link will be sent to your email. What is your email ID?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 11 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: oh beta my son is asking me what i am doing on phone... i am getting nervous... my email is pushpa.verma.delhi58@gmail.com ... what is this portal link? can you send the link here also so i can show him? maybe he can help me fill the form...

turns.scammer_message: Good! Agreement form link: http://quickloan-india-application.online/form Complete it after payment. For any queries email us at support@quickloan-processing.com

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 12 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i see the blue link... my son is standing right here and asking me who is messaging... he wants to see the phone... should i click on that link? what will open if i click it? pls tell me fast what to say to him i am very scared he will scold me
